Imports

stb

Types

Alert = ref object of Atom
  
App = ref object of Container
  init: bool

Atom = ref object of NElement
Attribute = object
  case kind*: NElementAttribute
  of naKind:
    aKind*: NElementKind
  of naText:
    aText*: string
  of naToolTip:
    aToolTip*: string
  of naName:
    aName*: string
  of naVisible:
    aVisible*: bool
  of naWrap:
    aWrap*: bool
  of naDate:
    aDate*: DateTime
  of naResizable:
    aResizable*: bool
  of naHasParent:
    aHasParent*: bool
  of naFocus:
    aFocus*: bool
  of naSize:
    aSize*: tuple[w, h: int]
  of naValue:
    aValue*: tuple[vInt: int, vFloat: float]
  of naRange:
    aRange*: Slice[float]
  of naStep:
    aStep*: float
  of naOpacity:
    aOpacity*: float
  of naLen:
    aLen*: int
  of naDecimals:
    aDecimals*: int
  of naMinimized:
    aMinimized*: bool
  of naMaximized:
    aMaximized*: bool
  of naOrientation:
    aOrientation*: NOrientation
  of naIndex:
    aIndex*: int
  of naSelected:
    aSelected*: int
  of naReorderable:
    aReorderable*: bool
  of naSide:
    aSide*: NSide
  of naBGColor:
    aBGColor*: Pixel
  of naBorder:
    aBorder*: int
  of naBorderColor:
    aBorderColor*: Pixel
  of naModal:
    aModal*: bool
  of naMode:
    aMode*: NAmount
  of naTransient:
    aTransient*: Window
  of naScrolled:
    aScrolled*: bool
  of naHeader:
    aHeader: seq[tuple[kind: NCellKind, name: string]]
  of naHeaders:
    aHeaders: bool
  of naRows:
    aRows: seq[NRow]
  of naSelectedCells:
    aSelectedCells: seq[tuple[x, y: int]]
  of naImg:
    aImg: Bitmap
  found*: bool

Attributes = array[NElementAttribute, Attribute]
Bar = ref object of Container
  
Bitmap = ref object
  img: seq[Pixel]
  w, h: int
  path: string

Box = ref object of Container
  
Bubble = ref object of Container
  
Button = ref object of Atom
  
Calendar = ref object of Atom
  
CheckBox = ref object of Atom
  
ComboBox = ref object of Container
  
Container = ref object of NElement
Entry = ref object of Atom
  
FileChoose = ref object of Atom
Image = ref object of Atom
  
Label = ref object of Atom
  
List = ref object of Container
  
Menu = ref object of Container
  
NAmount = enum
  naNone, naMinOne, naOne, naMultiple
NAsyncBitmapProc = (proc (bitmap: Bitmap) {.closure.})
NAsyncTextProc = (proc (text: string) {.closure.})
NCell = object
  case kind: NCellKind
  of ckBool:
    vBool*: bool
  of ckImg:
    vImg*: Bitmap
  of ckStr:
    vStr*: string
  of ckInt:
    vInt*: int
  
NCellKind = enum
  ckImg, ckBool, ckStr, ckInt
NCMPPRoc = (proc (a, b: NElement): int)
NElement = ref object of RootObj
  id: NID
  kind: NElementKind

NElementAttribute = enum
  naMinimized, naMaximized, naKind, naVisible, naHasParent, naFocus, naSize,
  naOpacity, naLen, naText, naToolTip, naWrap, naResizable, naValue,
  naOrientation, naIndex, naReorderable, naName, naSide, naBGColor,
  naBorderColor, naBorder, naModal, naTransient, naMode, naDate, naRange,
  naStep, naDecimals, naSelected, naScrolled, naHeader, naHeaders, naRows,
  naSelectedCells, naImg
NElementEvent = enum
  neNONE, neCLICK, neCLICK_RELEASE, neMOVE, neENTER, neCHANGE, neOPEN,
  neFOCUS_ON, neFOCUS_OFF, neDESTROY, neSHOW, neHIDE, neKEY_PRESS,
  neKEY_RELEASE, neFILE_CHOOSE_ACCEPT
NElementKind = enum
  neKindInvalid, neApp, neWindow, neContainer, neBubble, neBox, neComboBox,
  neCalendar, neTab, neList, neTable, neTools, neMenu, neBar, neTree, neAtom,
  neCheckBox, neRadio, neLabel, neEntry, neButton, neAlert, neImage, neProgress,
  neTextArea, neSlider, neFileChoose
NEventArgs = object
  element*: NElement
  case kind*: NElementEvent
  of neClick, neClickRelease, neMove:
      mouse*: set[NMouse]
      x*, y*: int
      selected*: int
      double*: bool

  of neChange:
      index*: int

  of neKeyPress, neKeyRelease:
      mods*: set[NKey]
      key*: NKey

  of neFILE_CHOOSE_ACCEPT:
      files*: seq[string]

  else:
      nil

  
NEventProc = (proc () {.closure.})
NguiBackEnd = enum
  beNIL, beDOC, beGTK3, beNUKLEAR
NID = uint32
NKey = enum
  nkNone, nkEsc, nkControl, nkShift, nkEnter, nkA, nkB, nkC, nkD, nkE, nkF, nkG,
  nkH, nkI, nkJ, nkK, nkL, nkM, nkN, nkO, nkP, nkQ, nkR, nkS, nkT, nkU, nkV,
  nkW, nkX, nkY, nkZ, nk0, nk1, nk2, nk3, nk4, nk5, nk6, nk7, nk8, nk9
NMouse = enum
  nm1, nm2, nm3
NOrientation = enum
  noHORIZONTAL, noVERTICAL
NRepeatHandle = distinct int
NRepeatProc = (proc (): bool {.closure.})
NRow = ref object
  cells*: seq[NCell]
  children*: seq[NRow]

NSide = enum
  nsTop, nsBottom, nsLeft, nsRight
NTable = Table
Pixel = object
  r*, g*, b*, a*: uint8

Progress = ref object of Atom
  
Radio = ref object of Atom

Bugs counter, nothing to see here.
